retrofit2.Call<PaginatedList> list​(@Query("page")

retrofit2.Call<Role> get​(@Path("roleId")

retrofit2.Call<Role> create​(@Body

retrofit2.Call<Role> update​(@Path("roleId")
                            long roleId,
                            @Body
                            RoleInfo toChange)

      • delete

retrofit2.Call<Void> delete​(@Path("roleId")
                            long roleId)
